name: Charlie Blast's Territory
overview: Here's a fun puzzle for you, Charlie. See if you can set up a series of bombs in time to blow yourself to the next level - before you get so nervous you explode. It's a total N64 blast for 1 to 4 players. Bursting with cool Line Bombs and Freeze Bombs to demolish your competition. 45 increasingly complicated Multi-Player game boards for Survival Mode and Territory Mode. 60 single player Puzzle Mode levels. All kinds of wacky booby-traps designed by the world-famous game designer Scott Kim.
